menu.title: Caesar salad
menu.description: A classic chicken salad recipe, featuring crunchy croutons and a creamy, garlic dressing. Ideal for lunch with friends.

menu.title: Pizza Margherita
menu.description: This light take on an Italian classic starts with an easy homemade dough, topped with no cook tomato sauce and ricotta cheese.

menu.title: Pizza Napoletana
menu.description: Beautiful napeoleon pizza with a crunchy crust with mouth melting mozzerela.

menu.title: Greece salad
menu.description: A fresh and colourful salad with large vine tomatoes, cucumber, a red onion, Kalamata olives, oregano, feta cheese, extra virgin olive oil.

menu.title: Cowboy Steak
menu.description: Bone-in rib-eye or porterhouse steak, fresh herb sprigs, such as thyme, oregano, and rosemary, garlic.
